title: Repeated Transaction
description: Defines recurring financial transactions within the application, including their scheduling, frequency, interval, and optional constraints like total occurrences or an end date.

payorId.description: Identifier for the payor in the transaction.

payeeId.description: Identifier for the payee in the transaction.

categoryId.description: Category identifier for organizing the transaction. Can be null if not categorized.

amount.description: The monetary value of the transaction.

frequency.description: Defines the base unit of time for the repetition.

interval.description: Specifies the number of frequency units between each occurrence (e.g., every 2 weeks).

occurrences.description: The total number of times the transaction should occur. Can be null if not specified.

endOn.description: The date on which the repeated transaction series should end. Can be null.

description.description: A detailed description of the transaction.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the transaction was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to the transaction. Can be null if not updated.
